title: Speaker Series
subtitle: Public/Private Engagements
description: Candid discussions with senior leaders in government, defense, tech, and industry. Built for actionable insights, not surface-level commentary.
outcomes: Timely topics tied to mission outcomes

title: National Security Fellowship
subtitle: Bi-directional Government/Industry
description: Two-way placement between government and industry professionals to foster trust, share expertise, and align on mission-critical technology and policy.
outcomes: Immersion in each other's operating environments

title: Veteran Mentoring
subtitle: Career Transition Support
description: A veterans-focused program that pairs operational experience with executive mentorship. Start by building your resume on Operation MOS, then connect with industry leaders for guidance.
